document_data.mainbody:
Helmets of grit were leather helmets, decorated with feathers and enchanted to boost the wearers agility.
The helmets magic was palpable to the touch anyone who touched it felt a surge of stamina. It granted the wearer a slight boost to their dexterity and nimbleness. Additionally, when the wearer was significantly hurt, the helmet granted them a boost to speed and reaction in battle.
As of the , one of the helmets of grit was stored within the Szarr Palace in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate.
